ThingDef.label: oak logs
ThingDef.description: Raw wood from trees or other fibrous plants. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch.

ThingDef.label: Ironwood logs
ThingDef.description: Wood from ironwood trees. Useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. A raw stick of wood can be used as a weapon in a pinch. Very beautiful decorative material.
